bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

form.pron: Fu ren san shi liu ji

sense.def: Alternative Names nü ren san shi liu ji 女人三十六疾 ; fu ren xia jiao san shi liu ji 婦人下焦三十六疾 , 36 types of ailments affecting the lower burner in women. Pathological Condition Combined Designation of all types of diseases associated with gynecology and obstetrics. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 4: 白石脂丸，治婦人三十六疾 , “Pills with bai shi zhi cure 36 types of women’s ailments ”.
